abstract: Jamaican Prime Min Bruce Golding announces that education minister Andrew Holness has received unanimous endorsement of lawmakers from governing party to become Golding's successor, salvaging party's chances in next general election.
snippet: Prime Minister Bruce Golding announced Tuesday that Andrew Holness had received the unanimous endorsement of lawmakers from the governing party to become the next leader.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Bruce Golding announced Tuesday that Andrew Holness had received the unanimous endorsement of lawmakers from the governing party to become the next leader.

headline.main: Jamaica: Prime Minister Names Education Official as His Successor
headline.print_headline: Jamaica: Prime Minister Names Education Official as His Successor
headline.seo: Jamaica’s Prime Minister Names Education Official as Successor
